intent: To develop an online learning platform offering professional certification courses in IT, finance, and healthcare, supporting a range of features for students and instructors.
functional_requirements: Content delivery through adaptive learning algorithms that adjust difficulty based on student performance
Integration with payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) for course purchases
technical_constraints: Video hosting Technology Stack: AWS S3 + CloudFront
ambiguities: Feasibility of completing all listed features, including adaptive learning and 10,000 concurrent users support, within the specified $35,000 budget and 10-month timeline with a team of 5.
Detailed definition of the adaptive learning algorithms and specific student performance metrics to be used.
Specific content creation, upload, and management workflows for courses and quizzes.
Detailed user roles and permissions beyond basic student and instructor roles (e.g., content moderator, super admin).
Specific security protocols beyond OAuth 2.0 (e.g., data encryption, compliance standards relevant to healthcare data).
Deployment environment for the main application beyond video hosting.
